name: Berserker (itch)
description:
Official Ludum Dare Entry Page

In Berserker you're a mighty barbarian suffering from anger management issues. Your inner rage boils away just beneath the surface, and can be unleashed at any moment!

Controls:

- WSAD/Arrow keys to move
- Move Mouse to swing your swords
- Left mouse button to use a potion and GO BERSERK!
